# EZ899-241752 | Km 228-367 Drainage Improvements Tender Announcement
=====================================================

## Notice Details
------------------

* **Title:** EZ899-241752 – Km 228-367 Drainage Improvements
* **Reference Number:** WS4574547057-Doc4574574527
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4574547057
* **Publication Date:** May 7, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 22, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** To be determined
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

## Scope of Work
-----------------

The successful bidder will be required to provide drainage improvements along the Alaska Highway between Fort St. John and Fort Nelson, BC. The scope of work includes, but is not limited to, the supply and installation of steel pipe culverts using trenchless technologies (1050 mm diameter to 2200 mm diameter), excavation and ditching, riprap end protection, decommissioning of existing CSP culverts, hydraulic seeding of disturbed areas, and traffic control.

## Terms and Conditions
-----------------------

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Bidding Process:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Contract Award Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
